723:0: CHAPTER 10 MAHA-KALPA-VIDHI-VISTARA Emanation of deities form samadhi atha bhagavān punarapi sarvatathāgatavajrasamayamudrādhiṣṭhānaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyemāṃ sarvavidyottamamabhāṣat oṃ sarvatathāgatavajrasamaye hūṃ||
723:1: atha vajrapāṇirmahābodhisatva imāṃ svavajrasasayamudrāmabhāṣat huṃ vajri maṭ||
723:2: atha vajragarbho bodhisatva imāṃ svaratnasamayamudrāmabhāṣat huṃ bhṛkuṭivajre raṭ||
723:3: atha vajranetro bodhisatvo mahāsatva imāṃ svadharmasamayamudrāmabhāṣat hūṃ padmavajri triṭ||
723:4: atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsatva imāṃ svakarmasamayamudrāmabhāṣat hūṃ vajrakarmāgri kṛṭ||
723:5: Delineation of the mandala atha vajrapāṇirmahābodhisatvaḥ punarapīdaṃ trilokavijayacaturmudrāmaṇḍalamabhāṣat|
723:13: Mudra athātra caturmudrāmaṇḍale mahāmaṇḍalayogenākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṃkṛtvā praveśya caturmudrāmaṇḍalaṃ guhyamudrājñānaṃ śikṣayet|
723:35: tato yathāvad vajrākrāntitriśūlamudrādyāḥ catasraḥ samayamudrāḥ savidhivistarāḥ śikṣayitvā,
723:42: tathaiva nṛtyan vāmāṃ tu gṛhya dakṣiṇamuṣṭinā|
723:43: parivartya lalāṭo tu niveśyāgryā mukhena ta||
723:52: II.6 Ekamudra-mandala a[tha vajrapā]ṇirmahābodhisatvaḥ punarapīmaṃ svavajrasamayakrodhasamayamabhāṣat huṃ||
723:53: Delineation of the mandala athāsya maṇḍalaṃ bhavati|
723:67: sādhaye tu bhage bidhvā sarvakarma susidhyati||
723:68: athāsya sādhanahṛdayaṃ bhavati huṃ vajrasamaya kṛta||
723:73: tatrāsyāḥ sādhanahṛdayaṃ bhavati huṃ vajrasamaya huṃ||
723:76: yathā maṇḍale evaṃ paṭādiṣu likhitānāṃ sarvapratimāsvapi sāmānyā siddhiriti|
723:78: “adhitiṣṭhata bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā mame[daṃ kulaṃ ye ca] sarvasatvā yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā sarvasiddhīḥ prāpnuyur” iti||
723:79: atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājamāgamyāsya trilokavijayakalpasyādhiṣṭhānāyedamūcuḥ|
723:80: sādhu te vajrasatvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te|
723:81: vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe||
